# Tour Of C# Docs

## Get started

- [Tour of C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/overview.md): New to C#? Learn the basics of the language. Start with this overview.
- [C# language strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/strategy.md): We keep evolving C# to meet the changing needs of developers and remain a state-of-the-art programming language. We will innovate eagerly and broadly in collaboration with C# developers
- [Learn C# for Java developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tips-for-java-developers.md): Are you new to C#, but experienced in Java? Here's a roadmap of what's familiar, and new features to learn in C#, and features in Java that aren't in C#.
- [Learn C# for JavaScript developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tips-for-javascript-developers.md): New to C#, but know JavaScript or TypeScript? Here's a roadmap of what's familiar, features in C# that aren't in JavaScript or TypeScript, and alternatives for features you use that aren't in C#
- [Learn C# for Python developers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tips-for-python-developers.md): New to C#, but know Python? Here's a roadmap of what's familiar, features in C# that aren't in Python, and alternatives for Python features that aren't in C#.

## Children

- [Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/tour-of-csharp/tutorials/llms.txt)
